resources.string:
Dismoi allows web users, experts, and media to post information directly on any page you browse.

 For instance :
 - warning you about scams on websites you visit
 - suggesting a better choice than the product what you are checking about
 - providing insights about an article you are reading
 - etc.


This way, you receive their advice and information at the moment you need it.


Dismoi is a free web extension that anybody can add to their web browser (currently Chrome and Firefox) Thanks to this extension, everyone can post information on the webpages they want. If you follow a contributor, his information messages are displayed at the time you visit the pages he has commented on.


Freedom of information : You receive only the information of contributors you have chosen.


Each Dismoi user can also ask a question about the web page they are visiting, to which contributors may respond to.

Mieux vaut acheter votre produit reconditionné ailleurs. Derrière la bonne image de marque de la plus grande place de marché du reconditionné en France, très nombreux sont les clients de Back Market à se plaindre sur le web : faible autonomie de batterie, accessoires défaillant, écran abîmé, connectivité, service-après vente, etc.
